New Records: The Cardinals, for the first time in franchise history, defeated the Bronx Bombers at the New Yankee Stadium.
Key Match Events: St. Louis Cardinals left fielder Lars Nootbaar scored a run on St. Louis Cardinals catcher Ivan Herrera's RBI double during the sixth inning.
Nolan Arenado hit an RBI single in the third inning.
Brendan Donovan hit a three-run homer in the third inning.
Giancarlo Stanton hit a three-run double in the bottom of the eighth inning.
Alex Verdugo grounded out to end the eighth inning with the tying run in scoring position.
Cardinals closer Ryan Helsley struck out Austin Wells to end the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees and Cardinals will resume their three-game series on Sunday.
New York currently maintains a one-game lead over the Baltimore Orioles in the American League East.
